Frameworks

HTML5 Boilerplate

The web's most popular front-end template.

Bootstrap

The most popular HTML, CSS, JS library for developing responsive, mobile friendly websites.

Foundation

An advanced, responsive front-end framework.

Pure CSS

A set of small, responsvie CSS modules that you can use in every web project.

UIkit

A lightweight and modular front-end framework for developing fast and powerful web interfaces.

Semantic UI

A development framework that helps create beautiful, responsive layouts.

Skeleton

A dead simple, responsive boilerplate. Light, simple starting styles, and zero compiling necessary.

Concise CSS

A framework written in SASS that is lightweight and easy-to-use.

Furtive

A forward-thinking, CSS micro-framework, mobile first with a small footprint that cuts down on the bandwidth necessary for downloading CSS.

Mueller Grid System

A modular grid system for responsive/adaptive and non-responsive layouts, based on Compass. Gives you full control over column width, gutter width, baseline grid and media-queries.

Get Base

A lightweight, simple, and responsive framework.

Materialize

A modern responsive front-end framework based on Material Design.

HTML & CSS

SASS

CSS preprocessor that allows you to use variables, nested rules, mixins, inline imports, and more, all with a fully CSS-compatible syntax.

LESS

A CSS pre-processor, meaning that it extends the CSS language, adding features that allow variables, mixins, functions and many other techniques.

CSS Tricks

A site about all things web design and development (not just CSS).

Bourbon

A simple, lightweight SASS tool set.

Animate.css

A library of ready-to-use, cross-browser animations for use in your web projects. Great for emphasis, home pages, sliders, and attention-guiding hints.

CSS Zen Garden

A demonstration of what can be accomplished through CSS-based design.

Flex-Box

The solution to all of your CSS positioning problems. Can I please just make a header with some elements that are responsive to size and are easy to center? Now you can.

30 CSS Selectors to Memorize

An incredibly useful list of advanced CSS selectors that you can use to make your layout infinitely sexier and well written.

HTML5 Cheat Sheet

A list of HTML tags.

Learn Layout

A guide to using CSS for layouts.

CSS Lint

A tool for cleaning up your CSS.

CSS Zen Garden

A demonstration of what can be accomplished through CSS-based design.

JavaScript

Angular.js

AngularJS lets you extend HTML vocabulary for your application. The resulting environment is extraordinarily expressive, readable, and quick to develop.

Ember.js

A productive, battle-tested JavaScript framework for building modern web applications. It includes everything you need to build rich UIs that work on any device.

Node.js

A JavaScript runtime build on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine.Node.js uses an event-driven, non-blocking I/O model that makes it lightweight and efficient.

Backbone.js

Gives structure to web applications by providing models with key-value binding, custom events, and more.

Grunt.js

A JavaScript task runner

Harp.js

Harp automatically preprocesses code and serves it to the browser as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

Jekyll

Transform your plain text into static websites and blogs.

Surge

Static web publishing for Front-End Developers. Simple, single-command web publishing. Publish HTML, CSS, and JS for free, without leaving the command line.

Intercooler

AJAX with attributes.

Format.js

FormatJS is a modular collection of JavaScript libraries for internationalization that are focused on formatting numbers, dates, and strings for displaying to people.

Leaflet

An open-source JavaScript library for mobile-friendly interactive maps.

RequireJS

A JavaScript file and module loader. It is optimized for in-browser use, but it can be used in other JavaScript environments, like Rhino and Node. Using a modular script loader like RequireJS will improve the speed and quality of your code.

Gulp

A toolkit to automate & enhance your workflow. Leverage gulp and the flexibility of JavaScript to automate slow, repetitive workflows and compose them into efficient build pipelines.

Yeoman

Yeoman helps you to kickstart new projects, prescribing best practices and tools to help you stay productive. To do so, we provide a generator ecosystem. A generator is basically a plugin that can be run with the `yo` command to scaffold complete projects or useful parts.

Yeoman

Yeoman helps you to kickstart new projects, prescribing best practices and tools to help you stay productive. To do so, we provide a generator ecosystem. A generator is basically a plugin that can be run with the `yo` command to scaffold complete projects or useful parts.

Magnifier.js

A Javascript library enabling magnifying glass effect on an images.

FitVid.js

A lightweight, easy-to-use jQuery plugin for fluid width video embeds.

Bounce.js

Bounce.js is a tool and JS library that lets you create beautiful CSS3 powered animations.

Fonts & Typography

Google Web Fonts

Free web fonts by Google.

Adobe Typekit

Web fonts, only a limited number if you don't have an account.

Practical Typography

A book on typography.

Beautiful Web Type

A showcase of the best typefaces from the Google web fonts directory.

Font Awesome

Scalable vector icons that can instantly be customized — size, color, drop shadow, and anything that can be done with the power of CSS.

Yeoman

Yeoman helps you to kickstart new projects, prescribing best practices and tools to help you stay productive. To do so, we provide a generator ecosystem. A generator is basically a plugin that can be run with the `yo` command to scaffold complete projects or useful parts.

Font Squirrel

Fonts 100% free for commercial use.

Canva Font Pairing

Canva's ultimate guide to font pairing.

Tiff

A type diff tool that visually contrasts the differences between two fonts.

Icon Monstr

Free icons!

Ico Moon

Pixel perfect icon solutions.

Glyphicon

A library of precisely prepared monochromatic icons and symbols, created with an emphasis to simplicity and easy orientation.

Iconic

Multiweight, responsive icon font.

Free online tool that allows you to easily detect what WordPress theme a site uses (including parent and child themes) and also Plugins.
